title._content: [Captain William A. Hill of Company D, 4th Virginia Cavalry Regiment, with book on lap]  (LOC)

description._content: [Captain William A. Hill of Company D, 4th Virginia Cavalry Regiment, with book on lap] [1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.2 x 8.1 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather; decorative diamond motif surrounded by scrolls design. Title on spine of book appears to be Literary history of the Bible. Written on object: Taken at Culpeper 1865. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Photo shows identified soldier. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (DLC/PP-2012:127). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Confederate States of America.--Army.--Virginia Cavalry Regiment, 4th.--Company D--People--Virginia--Culpeper--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--Virginia--Culpeper--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--Virginia--Culpeper--1860-1870. Books--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate--Virginia--Culpeper. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.31698 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2752
